title: GRAPENT Flare Pants for Women High Wasited Stretchy Faux Leather Look Button Fly Jeans Trendy Bell Bottom Trousers
description: The pants for women jeans come with high waist detail, providing extra coverage and support around the midsection, helping smooth out the stomach area.

Button fly design gives a classic and vintage touch to high waisted pants, adding a timeless appeal to your outfit, elevating your overall look and making a stylish statement. Flare legs layout can help elongate the legs, creating a more balanced and visually appealing figure.

Our pants for womens fashion with five functional pockets eliminates the need to carry a bag or purse for small essentials, being particularly useful when you're on the move, engaging in outdoor activities, or simply want to have your hands available for other tasks.
The high rise flare jeans for women are made of comfy and stretchy leather look fabric, making you feel at ease throughout the day without compromising on style or functionality.

GRAPENT trousers for women high waisted run true to standard US sizes. Size X-Small fits size 0 to size 2, Size Small fits size 4 to size 6, Size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, Size Large fits size 12 to size 14, Size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18.
